title: Tape Begin
source:
[[ifexpr "%%this|fullname%%"=="component:tape-begin"]]
[[iftags визуальный_элемент]]
[[module Redirect destination="/component:tape"]]
[[/iftags]]
[[/ifexpr]]

[[scope]]
[[div class="tape-wrap" style="--total-duration: 23.3"]]
[[declare componentTapeDelay .5]]
[[if {$show}]]
[[declare componentTapeShow {$show}]]
[[else]]
[[declare componentTapeShow Прослушать]]
[[/if]]
[[if {$hide}]]
[[declare componentTapeHide {$hide}]]
[[else]]
[[declare componentTapeHide Заново]]
[[/if]]
[[collapsible show="{@componentTapeShow}" hide="{@componentTapeHide}"]]
[[div class="tape-anim"]]
[[div class="tape-left"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="tape-right"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="tape-record"]]
